Articles.Content:
Hi all.

Whenever I click "Resume Saved" in the menu, the button acts as if it's clicked but nothing happens.

I have no other details to provide.

Scenarios and training work.

I have:

KAS (outdated, but it has been working fine for the past month)

Raster Prop Monitor (I'll delete this)

Kaboom! (Outdated, works fine!)

Kerbal Alarm Clock (updated)

Hyperedit (updated)

and Stock Bug Fix modules (I'll delete this)

Anyone know what's up?

- - - Updated - - -

Nevermind, MasterTao helped me fix it!

I've been having this issue too. I have Chatterer, KER, Hyperedit, and Kerbal Joint Reinforcement installed. 

What's the fix?
